name: Troll Toll
description:
An entry for Extra Credits Game Jam 5

Anyone who wants PASSAGE over this bridge must pay the troll's toll.

Troll Toll is all the fun of being a bureaucratic bridge troll! Guard the only bridge in town and make sure all travels pay their correct taxes. Cross examine forms and papers to calculate the correct toll. Make sure your math is right or its coming out of your pay.

This game will be made open source and have an update with extra levels when the votes are over and the Upload feature is open again
